data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 667,658 believers in Kwara, Nigeria a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kwara, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Kwara who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kwara, Nigeria who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Kwara, Nigeria, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Busa, Bussawa people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Busa, Bussawa people.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Kwara, Nigeria.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kwara, Nigeria not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kwara, Nigeria has a population of 2,591,600.

We estimate Kwara has 667,658 people who might know Jesus, 659,495 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,264,447 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 667,658 believers in the state of Kwara to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
